actions.action: Delay until a specific date or date-based property
Delay a set amount of time, until a specific day of the week, or time of day
Add enrolled object to list or remove from list
Send automated email to a contact associated with the enrolled record
Send email notification to a user or team
Send an in-app notification to a user or team
Create a new record (contact, company, deal, ticket, lead, apartment, booking, reservation, group, platform, block, appointment)

connection.description: Default edge type used to connect actions in a linear sequence.
This edge type is used when you have branches in your workflow and need to jump to an action in a different branch.
